Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. But he had no regrets about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan-- the latter now nearing its 10th anniversary. Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
